# Ignore files and folders generated by the Android build system

# Generated files
*.apk
*.aab
*.ap_
*.dex
*.class

# Folders
build/
.gradle/

# Local configuration
local.properties

# IDE-specific files
.idea/
*.iml
.cxx/
.externalNativeBuild/

# Keystore files
*.jks
*.keystore

# Google Services (usually committed, but can be ignored if needed)
# google-services.json

# Crashlytics
crashlytics-build.properties
com_crashlytics_export_strings.xml

# Other
captures/
.DS_Store
lint-results-*.xml
lint-results-*.html
